message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product for a one-time price of $120. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I can do $115, which is a compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100? That's the lowest I can go.
